medium: Color woodcuts and letterpress, bound volume
signed: on last page, in black ink: [124/ Tom Breidenbach]; on last page, in blue ink: Donald Baechler
text: People have nightmares about my paintings sometimes, Donald Baechler once said. It pleases me enormously. For this artist's book, Baechler fashioned a series of disembodied heads to accompany Tom Breidenbach's pantoums, a form of verse in which the second and fourth lines of one quatrain are repeated as the first and third lines of the next.
title: The Double Whammy
